item.description:
The conclusion of the epic ride! Since the Harvard Loews will be closed by opening night, RIP!, I'm moving the event to the new go-to-theatre, the Boston Commons Loews.  I also realized today that the date I picked was the same as the picnic, so I'm changing that too.  Hopefully people can still come.  Otherwise, feel free to fling things at me at the monthly meeting tomorrow :)

Let's plan to meet for dinner at Silvertone (http://www.yelp.com/biz/silvertone-boston#query:downtown%20crossing%20restaurants) at 5:30.  Post movie, we can try that cute little cafe again :)  Though, the movie clock in at 2h45, so we may be comatose by then end...
item.how_to_find_us: I'll either be standing outside the restaurant at 5:15 or outside the theatre at 7:15. Hard to miss me...maybe I'l wear something crazy.
item.name: The Dark Knight Rises (7:00pm/7:30pm @ Boston Common Loews)
